SEARCH

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Person
Student
public class Student extends Person
Represents a student who is a person with a registration number and acceptable projects. Each student can be assigned at most one project.

  • Constructor Summary

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Checks if this student is equal to another object. Two students are considered equal if they are the same person and have the same registration number.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
